heaviest_rainfall.status: The most intense rainfall recorded took place on 04 January 2025, with precipitation totalling 36.8mm.  The rain fell at 4.6mm per hour at times over the course of the 37.2 hour storm.

heaviest_rainrate.status: The heaviest rain rate registered stands at 27.0mm per hour on 02 September 2025, highlighting an extreme precipitation event.  21.19mm fell during the storm over 15.0 hours.

longest_rain.status: The record duration for continuous rain was set on 04 January 2025, the storm lasted 37.2 hours with a total precipitation of 36.8mm and it reached 4.6mm per hour at times.

most_lightning.status: The most lightning activity recorded in a single day is 23, which occurred on 07 September 2025 (since our records began on 11 April 2025).

storm.status: The last storm was on 26 October 2025 which lasted for 1 day.

top_10_dry.status: The longest dry period started on 24 April 2025 and lasted for 19 days.

top_10_rainy.status: The longest rainy period started on 30 November 2024 and lasted for 10 days.

cold_snaps.status: There is currently no cold snap.  This year there have been 6 cold snaps, usually there are 3.7 cold snaps per year.

extreme.status: The highest recorded temperature difference is 26.7°C from 29 April 2025 (when the temperature reached 27.1°C but fell to 0.4°C).

heatwaves.status: There is no heatwaves at the moment.  This year has experienced 6 heatwavess, with an average of 1.9 per year.

tropical.status: The last tropical night was on 18 July 2025 and it has only happened 62 times since 1973.

average.status: The current average daily wind direction is south-westerly (225°).  In the UK, a south-westerly wind often means mild and wet weather.

gusts.status: The record wind gust remains at 93.7 mph from 13 October 2012.

run.status: 1737 miles is the largest wind run recorded on 21 October 2012.

speed.status: The largest wind speed ever was on 13 October 2012 with a value of 93.7 mph.

top_10_windy.status: The longest windy period started on 11 October 2012 and lasted for 21 days.

summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.7°C) and outside temperature (up 3.4°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 237 m) and inside temperature (up 2.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 53.7m higher than yesterday, 35.8m higher than the past week, 237.3m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 604m to a maximum of 2320m, averaging 1105.5m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1069.7m and 1342.8m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; on the cooler side. Outside; cold weather is expected. Also, low humidity will be noticeable and near calm conditions. Drizzle or light rain possible, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and it’s dark. Changeable conditions.

washing.phrase: It is nighttime; if you have washing out then bring it in as it will probably get damper overnight.
